about_the_game:
This is a sports game. Watch the dance face to face . Dance with her ,Slow down to learn the action，Speed up, experience the thrill of the rhythm,Appreciation and exercise. If you like to watch MMD, then you must not miss this game.
If you have any better suggestions or content, please E-mail.

The trial version is the same as the paid version. If you feel the experience is good, please buy the official version, and your encouragement is the driving force for me to move forward!
detailed_description:
This is a sports game. Watch the dance face to face . Dance with her ,Slow down to learn the action，Speed up, experience the thrill of the rhythm,Appreciation and exercise. If you like to watch MMD, then you must not miss this game.
If you have any better suggestions or content, please E-mail.

The trial version is the same as the paid version. If you feel the experience is good, please buy the official version, and your encouragement is the driving force for me to move forward!
name: MeiMeiDance Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz 或更快的 Intel 或 AMD 四核处理器
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz 或更快的 Intel 或 AMD 四核处理器
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
